reqs:
Pre-reqs: RHSC 501.
Sec 003 Acquired Brain Injury - (1) register here if this is your second 583 course (B); or (2) register here to reserve a place if the course "letter" you should take is full. Then notify info@mrsc.ubc.ca immediately so that your registration can be moved to the correct letter at a later date.
Sec 020 Chronic Disability and Self-Management - (1) register here if this is your second 583 course (B); or (2) register here to reserve a place if the course "letter" you should take is full. Then notify info@mrsc.ubc.ca immediately so that your registration can be moved to the correct letter at a later date.
Sec 002 Transformational Leadership - (1) register here if this is your second 583 course (B); or (2) register here to reserve a place if the course "letter" you should take is full. Then notify info@mrsc.ubc.ca immediately so that your registration can be moved to the correct letter at a later date.
***NOTE: This is a 3-credit course register only for RHSC 583 sec 002; staff will automatically register you in sec 021 at a later date***
Sec 013 Qualitative and Survey Research - (1) register here if this is your second 583 course (B); OR (2) register here to reserve a place if the course "letter" you should take is full. Then notify info@mrsc.ubc.ca immediately so that your registration can be moved to the correct letter at a later date.
***NOTE: This is a 3-credit course register only for RHSC 583 sec 013; staff will automatically register you in sec 014 when it becomes available in April 2018***
Sec 021 Transformational Leadership: this section can only be taken with Sec 002.
***NOTE: This is the second section of a 3-credit course register only for RHSC 583 sec 002; staff will automatically register you in sec 021 at a later date***
courseName: Applying Research to Practice - APPLY RSRCH PRAC
